replies.bodyText: Eventually yes but for now we could exclude the override if "beam_fn_api" was used as an experiment.
replies.author: lukecwik

replies.bodyText: I thought the only application of this override is with the beam_fn_api flag enabled. The legacy translation does not support Impulse.
replies.author: mxm

replies.bodyText: Users/framework will need to ensure that the beam_fn_api experiment is always used.
replies.author: lukecwik

replies.bodyText: I was able to remove JavaReadViaImpulse. It required fixing up some tests that weren't setting the beam_fn_api experiment.
replies.author: lukecwik

[BEAM-5605] Convert all BoundedSources to SplittableDoFns when using portable pipelines.

Remote JavaReadViaImpulse and make "beam_fn_api" use SplittableDoFn by default.

timeline.bodyText: Just to make sure I'm understanding correctly: This transform was only used for portable pipelines, right? So it isn't needed anymore now that we execute bounded reads by wrapping them in an SDF?
